summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3776 for the improvement of Westlake Avenue North, from Aloha Street to 4th Avenue North; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46477, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
